values:
It feels like one of those nights when you turn on music and dance like nobody's watching.

In fact, I think I'm going to do just that. :3

Homework's been finished since Friday, yesterday afternoon was one of those rare days when everybody was home and not doing anything except for flopping, and then I spent this morning at the gym. Despite that, though, I still have a lot of energy... therefore I want to dance. ♥

Oh yeah, and we got our test results back~ I did really, really well on them all.
Tezuka~ My dad said tomorrow morning would work just fine. :3 He doesn't have to go into work, and he's looking forward to it.

I get so busy and before I know it, it's nearly the end of August and the beginning of the next school term. Summer vacation sure went by quickly, didn't it? Our last summer vacation and autumn term as high schoolers...~ It's actually sort of depressing when I think about it. This is the term when tennis comes to an end, too... let's do our best, everyone. :3 ♥ Let's make this last run count. [ I feel almost relieved that my parents know, now. I don't need to tip-toe around them, nor do I need to particularly hide anything. I'm surprised with how smoothly dinner went with Tezuka there - my mom did ask a ridiculous amount of questions, but at least she's okay with it in the end. I wasn't really expecting what she... did, either. I honestly can't remember the last time I've hugged my mom. I really do think that things can only get better from here. I'm not going to be in the house for that much longer, I don't think, and I've already began to think about the different possibilities once I've graduated... but for now, I'm comfortable. On that note, though... I don't think Ayana is going to be staying around for much longer. I just have this feeling that she'll be bringing up the idea of moving out soon with my parents. It almost feels like... we're taking the next step. I don't need my big sister like I used to, and she doesn't need to fill the special role she's always had in the family, anymore. My parents have accepted that I'm more than old enough to make my own decisions, and they can recognize something that makes me happy, even if they don't agree. I think my parents are slowly realizing that they don't need to work as hard, anymore... it's really only a matter of time before they slow down, I think. They don't need to support us as much, anymore. Ayana's almost twenty-two, I'm almost eighteen - we're adults. :3 And while I'm thinking about it, too... I can't get over how happy 'nee-chan is. I don't remember seeing her ever this happy when she was dating her ex-boyfriend; especially not when she entered college. And Kentarou... he's so happy, too. They're both so very obvious. I know I freaked out when I first found out, but now I look at them and think to myself that maybe it was always supposed to be like that. It's almost weird. I mean, it's strange to look at your big sister and your best friend and believe that they were meant to be together, now. I think I've done enough thinking for the night, though. I'm gonna phone and see if Kentarou and Higashikata want to play something. >:O ] [ I wanted to tell you that I showed my parents that journal entry I wrote when I was a kid. You were right - it was something they appreciated very much. I didn't mean to make my mom cry or anything, but... I guess it was really something special to them. She even asked me if she could keep it tucked away, and I told her I didn't mind. Also, I have a question~ :3 There's a big end of the summer fireworks show and festival Friday afternoon and evening... will you come with me? ♥ ]

<lj-cut text="Private">[ I did it - it's over.

Mom's not happy... she's never spoken to me that coldly before. Dad's a bit better about it, and I really do have to thank him - both he and Ayana saved my ass.

It really hurt, but I know she'll like Tezuka. She's met him before, but she's never had a chance to sit down and get to know him properly. For now, though, I'm just going to stay out of her way.

As much as I didn't want to tell them, I do feel a lot better. It's like a giant weight has been lifted off my chest, and now I don't have to worry about them just finding out on their own. ]</lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="Tezuka">[ Camping was so much fun. :3 ♥ Thank you for taking me and patiently answering my millions of questions. I'd love to go again - I really learned a lot. It's so nice to get away from the city even if only for a weekend...~

Oh, and I talked to my parents the other night. It... well, it could've gone worse, I think. They'll get used to the idea eventually. My dad has asked to have you over for dinner one day soon, though, if you don't mind. ^^; I think it'll help the issue with my mom if she has a chance to get to know you a bit, and my dad's just curious about you. ]</lj-cut>

Beach this weekend~ Nobody forget. ♥ 

Spending the morning at the gym with a punching bag feels really good. I need to make it a regular thing, again - I've been slacking off a bit with how much I've been practicing tennis, but it's always a nice change of pace to do something else even if just for a couple of hours. Now the tennis practices have slowed down a bit, I think I'm going to go more often. :3

I really didn't mean to abandon you all here~ Did you miss me? ;3 Now that the tournament's over, I think Yamabuki's joined in on the flopping from the heat that other schools seem to be suffering from. It'd be nice if we could somehow get our hands on using the gym some days for practicing, but we probably won't be so lucky when other teams are also using the facilities. And on that note, congrats to 'Buki~ ♥ I'm proud of my team for their performance at the tournament. Three strikes, you're out, Hyou~tei. Also, Tensai-kun, the beach is a go for us that weekend. :3 [ ka;lsfj;lksjflk;sjtoiwj45uoijroiweaj;dsf asjkrlj4;l5j adljf;l45jl;j345wl3j6lkj6 w45kjkl;jsa adsl;j435j;ljt6wjysljk I haven't felt that turned on in a while. What is it about Tezuka? Is it because in past relationships I've been so focused on pleasuring the other that my wishes have been pushed a bit to the side? No one has ever been able to reduce me to that before. The walk and train ride home felt way longer than it should have, and I swear I took twice as long in the shower as I usually do. ...I haven't stopped dreaming about it, though, and it's been three days. I'm also not going to worry so much about my parents, right now. I'll put a bit more thought into it after the camping trip, but for now, there's no point getting worked up about it. ] [ooc: strike gone. :D;]
And here I thought that I would have an okay day today. So much for that idea. I don't really want to talk about it though, so I'm just going to bed. Blah.

<lj-cut text="Tezuka">Tezuka,
I'm not sure if Seigaku has anything planned for Saturday after the tournament, but I was wondering - would you like to spend the night at my house on Saturday night? :3 ♥

<strike>I miss y</strike> I'll see you at the tournament.

~Sengoku

My last class today was canceled for whatever reason, so I have a bit of time before tennis practice starts to get an entry in. ♥ Seigaku had a good idea with the Kyoto trip, really~ 'Buki's done similar things in the past, but it's never been something like that. Might be worth bringing up with the student council and seeing what they think. :3 Not necessarily as far, but there are nice areas outside of Tokyo that I'm sure many people haven't been to. As long as there are no more stairs. And I'd like you to know, Eiji, that I'm not that difficult to get a hold of. >:O You can't talk since you haven't replied to some of my mails in the past. I really hope I don't get sick. I hope Tezuka's feeling alri He's been on my mind all da I guess I can't really type this, huh? I'm sounding like Oishi, anyway. [ Talking to Tezuka-san about us was a little... awkward, last night. I felt a bit put on the spot, and there wasn't a whole lot I could really say. It's almost a bit of a relief that she seemed in support of it, though. ...But I'm still not really looking forward to when my parents find out. I don't want to get in an argument as a result... ]

[ I've adjusted to the idea. I mean... it's still very weird. My best friend is dating my big sister. I walked in to see them making out on the couch. It's one thing to walk in on your sister making out with someone on the couch - it's another to see your best friend making out with someone on the couch. But... together? I don't think I've ever been that surprised in my life before. I guess I kinda did overreact. At least everything is out in the open, now. I don't know how long it's been going on, and I really do wish they had told me themselves rather than have me accidentally walking in on them, but... I guess in a way I'm kinda happy, too. These are the two most important people to me in my life and they've found happiness together. That's something to be happy about. >:O Doesn't mean I necessarily have to love the idea... ...But it's not gonna just go away because I want it to. At least I won't ever have to worry about needing to kick either of their asses. Kentarou's a great guy and will take care of my sister - 'nee-chan is a great woman and she'll take care of my best friend. I know they're both happy for who I've found... the least I can do is feel the same toward them. ♥ On the subject of Tezuka... well. There's not much to really say about this. I'm in love with him - it's simple. It seemed far more confusing a month ago until I kinda realized it. 'Nee-chan and I have talked about it several times, actually. It's still... a scary feeling, and especially when it's this strong. Though, I'm really not looking forward to the time when I have to tell my parents - they're not going to approve of me dating a male, no matter how wonderful of a person Tezuka is. They must be wondering why I haven't brought a girl home in quite a while, so I wouldn't be surprised if they've already figured it out (...then again, I'm also not going to be surprised if they haven't - mom and dad haven't exactly been very... observant about some things in my life; especially when it comes to dating), but still. Not looking forward to that, whenever it should come up. I'm so happy, though. ^^ ♥ This is such a wonderful feeling. ] I'm sorry for my outburst the other day. ♥ I'm doing much better for any of you who were puzzled. I've really felt something strongly lately, and I think I can understand the feeling parents get when their children do something to make them proud. I've been just watching the team - watching the first years work hard and really look up to some of the older players, helping the second years become stronger so they can work hard for their regular spots next year, and observing the third years as they compete to try to defeat a regular in the ranking matches. Then, of course, our regulars - training diligently so we can climb higher in the ranks to secure a spot in nationals. What makes this so special to me, though, is the fact that everyone's still having a great time. We've all really worked hard together to create a team that is competitive, but doesn't forget that the only reason why we're playing tennis at all - for the love of the game. I think that's something that is sometimes shoved to the side in favor of all the rivalries and tournaments where everyone's goal is to win... I'm proud of my school. I've gone to 'Buki for twelve years, and I want to continue to until I'm no longer able to. I'm proud of my team, of my club, of my friends and teammates... I know I'm not always a good one, but... I'm proud to be fukubuchou. :3 And I'm proud of our buchou - the one who holds us all together as a team, and has played the largest part in making 'Buki the way it is today. He may not be the perfect buchou, but he's perfect for us. I wouldn't have it any other way. ♥ I've also realized I don't say thank you nearly enough as I should; so, to all who deserve to have this said to them, thank you - for everything. :3 ♥ I think I'm going to go out and buy both my mom and sister a bouquet of their favorite flowers, and write a letter to put beside my dad's dinner on the table to read when he comes home late. [ooc: *snuggles my boy* He decided to go all rambly and ♥-y at me. :/]

[ I won't steal Neko-chan's word, I won't steal Neko-chan's word. ... >:O Okay, fine. Hee. ♥ When I suggested karaoke, I wasn't thinking that it would end up like... that. I want to find more of those spots - I like the reaction that results from even a simple touch. I understand that he's not ready for feelings like that, though, and I'm not in any rush for if it does eventually wind up like that. The thought is really nice, though. Really nice. I've always felt attracted to him, but why is it that I've just now (like walking into a freaking screen door >:O) realized that Tezuka is really, really, really hot? a;lsdjf;aowi4trfj;alksjdfqp3eiwo4fraow4rjfkjl48dlkjsfd9isldfkjadfgj;:pkf'lskd I'm falling so hard. Now that it's happened once, I'm craving it again. God, for someone who doesn't know what he's doing, he's certainly good at it. If he's had any worries... yeah, he can just throw them away. It's like I told him - it comes naturally. And I think it comes just a bit too naturally for him. Looking back on myself, I must've really failed. No wonder I got dumped by my first serious girlfriend. :/ Not like I can complain, though. ♥ He surprises me on a regular basis, and I like that a lot. ...Shower time. ] Thank you for humoring me at karaoke. :3 ♥ However, now I want to explore your back with my bare han Get that man into a choir or something. Also, stop sitting on your ass, Oishii-san. ♥ It's payback time for how many times you've said that to me. Stop sitting on your ass, Neko-chan. ♥ And please respond to my email. :3 Ah~ 'Buki's doing well. ♥ We took both doubles and S3 easily - seems like last week's practice paid off well in the end. Even if people were wondering what the hell got into their fukubuchou all of a sudden. I'm already looking forward to the next, whenever it should fall. I should check with Kentarou to make sure I have dates written down properly in my schedule. Oh, and congrats to Seigaku - especially to Tezuka and Momoshiro. Your game was certainly one to watch; you had quite a crowd happening there. :3

And another Friday the 13th has passed. ♥ God, I hate that day. Let's total up everything and see what happened this time: - Accidentally ate the last piece of bread this morning without knowing that my sister was planning on eating it; 'nee-chan was pissed at me, and as far as I know she is. I really, really hate it when she's angry at me, and especially for small things like that. I'm hoping it's just PMS and not really what I did. ._. - Accidentally did something at practice that I don't feel like talking about, but made Kentarou a bit mad. - Forgot my PE uniform, and the teacher wouldn't let me wear my tennis stuff since he thought that would be "bragging" - it's not like everyone doesn't already know that I'm fukubuchou of the tennis club. Geez. I just wanted to do PE! - Lost a game against Touji. - Got lost trying to find Kawamura Sushi. - Spilled Fanta on my school uniform - that's gonna be a bitch to get out. - My parents and 'nee-chan didn't come home all night - 'nee-chan spent the night at her boyfriend's, but... I dunno where my parents disappeared off to. - Had a headache for a couple hours before I went to sleep. - Gave Tezuka my bad luck. I think the list is a little shorter than last time, though, which is good. But, still, hate that day. Just thank god it's over. :3 And after I was lost it got a bit better, so... well, I'm okay~ Not like it's anything I won't bounce back from, though I really don't know how to get this Fanta out of my uniform. And Kentarou came and spent some time with me after I got home from Kawamura-kun's, so I wasn't lonely, or anything. Thank you again. Really, really. I know I don't have to say it again, but... well, you made the day better, and I just thought I'd let you know. [ Smitten. I think that's a good word for it. I'm rather quite smitten, and it's a nice feeling - makes my stomach flop, and my heart flutter, and makes me wonder if I've ever exactly felt like this before. It's just... it's different - it's new. I realy like it. ^^; I feel kinda silly typing all this, though, when I've already flopped on Kentarou and talked to him about it. ...Okay, Kiyosumi, you're acting like a girl. ]

He~eh. Seigaku's practice was a lot of fun - I think I wanna do that again, one day, if you'd be alright with that, Oishi. ♥ Despite what Tezuka says, though, I have no plans to transfer there - there's no way I could leave my 'Buki. :3

And, of course, playing a match against Tezuka. ♥ I have to say, I do know where I need to improve my game, now, and I'll be working hard on that for the upcoming tournaments. Yamabuki's working harder than ever, this year; we're going as far as we possibly can.

;3 Spam me again. I could use some entertainment~

<lj-cut text="Private">[ Well, I was honest. ♥ We'll just see how it goes from here~ ]</lj-cut>

...Of all nights, my body chooses tonight make it difficult for me to sleep. I did manage to sleep for about an hour and a half, but now that I've woken up again... it's like my body is doing this on purpose. I wanna be well-rested for tomorrow, and I have to be up earlier than usual. Gah. Screw you, too, body. >:O I'm gonna sleep whether you like it or not. [ I don't think it's 'cause of Tezuka that I can't sleep, right? I mean, it'd be silly to be a bit... apprehensive about tomorrow. It's not like I'm doing something completely out of my league, right? I'm still gonna be the role of fukubuchou, it's just going to be for another team for the day - and then it's not like playing a match against Tezuka is all that strange, either. There is what's gonna happen after, but... ...Oh god, these better not be butterflies. I haven't had butterflies since the first time I asked a girl out on a date for ice cream in my last year of elementary school... and that was when I was twelve. Aye, aye. :3 I dunno what's up with me, but I really need to sleep. ]

It's good to see that Tezuka Seigaku's decided to join me here - now I have people to bug. ;3 And from the sounds of things, the fukubuchou switch is gonna happen after all. ♥ Kentarou gave me that look of his, but oh well~ I'm just glad that he and Oishi are friends so it's possible. Anything I should know in particular before I do come, Tezuka? :3 I call for random conversations~ Everyone respond to this post so I can spam you? ;3
